definition: steady, earnest, and energetic effort : devoted and painstaking work and application to accomplish an undertaking : assiduity
examples: showed great diligence in tracking down the story
He had earned universal respect for his integrity, fairness, and diligence.

definition: the attention and care legally expected or required of a person (such as a party to a contract) — see also due diligence

examples: The railway had driven coach companies out of business …. Once, the journey had taken three days by diligence.
